# MCP Server for Ruby RSpec Test Generation

## Project Overview
This is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that generates Ruby RSpec test cases from API curl requests.

## Capabilities
- Parse curl requests to extract API details
- Generate functional and component test cases for APIs
- Create new or edit existing RSpec spec files
- Analyze Ruby test framework structure

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for MCP server implementation
- Follow MCP SDK patterns and conventions
- Generate idiomatic Ruby RSpec tests
- Support both functional and component test patterns
